document.full_text: a top federal reserve official signaled on friday the central bank won't tighten monetary policy any time soon, even as the jobs recovery looked set to quicken.
document.title: dudley signals fed won't tighten any time soon
lines_and_colors: a top federal reserve official signaled on friday the central bank won't tighten monetary policy any time soon, even as the jobs recovery looked set to quicken.
